description.displayText: Caitlin is an amazing nanny. She has been watching our newborn for about a year now and is really good with her. She's basically a part of the family now. She's very punctual and always communicates with you. It's a great feeling when you know your little one is safe and in good hands.
description.originalText: Caitlin is an amazing nanny. She has been watching our newborn for about a year now and is really good with her. She's basically a part of the family now. She's very punctual and always communicates with you. It's a great feeling when you know your little one is safe and in good hands.

description.displayText: She's great with any aged child and great with everyday activities and schedules.  She's super reliable and was great with transportation and errands. She's my go to every time I need a day sitter or even when I needed her long term
description.originalText: She's great with any aged child and great with everyday activities and schedules.  She's super reliable and was great with transportation and errands. She's my go to every time I need a day sitter or even when I needed her long term

description.displayText: Caitlin responded several times to message and seems like a great candidate.  We had a meeting scheduled.  I sent two texts and messaged her through Care.com to confirm without a reply.  She did not show up and did not communicate that she wouldn't be at the meeting.  I understand that things in life happen however I would expect the courtesy of communication.
description.originalText: Caitlin responded several times to message and seems like a great candidate.  We had a meeting scheduled.  I sent two texts and messaged her through Care.com to confirm without a reply.  She did not show up and did not communicate that she wouldn't be at the meeting.  I understand that things in life happen however I would expect the courtesy of communication.

description.displayText: Caitlin is an extremely warm individual who has your child as her clear priority.  From the moment we met her, she focused her attention to my son in the way that I had never seen any other potential nanny or babysitter do. She was focused on his interests, his needs and his personality.  My son has grown to absolutely adore her as have I and we consider ourselves blessed to have found such an amazing individual to fill this need in our lives.  I absolutely recommend her for any family looking for an honest, genuine, caring person to keep their children protected and engaged while you are away.

description.displayText: Caitlin was at ease with my 2 1/2 year old son.  She was fun, warm and super attentive.  I HIGHLY recommend her for your child care needs.
